notes: Dimensions and clearances from manual: 400w x 724h x 310d; above 170/210mm depending on flue; below 186mm; 5mm either side; front 450mm (reduced) or 600mm normal; one side needs 300mm clear to floor for service when using 450mm front clearance.
Same casing and clearance table as the combi: 400w x 724h x 310d; above 170/210mm; below 186mm; 5mm either side; front 450/600mm; 300mm clear to one side for reduced front servicing.

Casing: 390w x 600h x 270d. Minimum clearances in unventilated cupboard: above ≈170mm (30mm above elbow), below 200mm, sides 5mm, front 600mm to removable door; suggested total side clearance ~400mm for good servicing access.
Product dimensions 375w x 602h x 280d. Minimum clearances: top 150mm (front/rear flue), sides 5mm (or more if removing panels), front 600mm for servicing.
System version shares casing with Energy7 regular: 375w x 602h x 280d. Same 150mm top and 600mm front service clearance used for positioning.
